original_text: for they would turn away your sons from following me, to serve other gods. Then the anger of the Lord would be kindled against you, and he would destroy you quickly.
korean_text: 그가 네 아들을 유혹하여 그가 여호와를 떠나고 다른 신들을 섬기게 하므로 여호와께서 너희에게 진노하사 갑자기 너희를 멸하실 것임이니라

sentences.original_text: for they would turn away your sons
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 너의 아들들을 돌이킬 것이기 때문에

sentences.original_text: Then the anger of the Lord
and he would destroy you quickly
